name: 3OMB
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
The $2OMB algorithmic token serves as the backbone of a rapidly growing ecosystem aimed towards bringing liquidity and new use cases to the Opera network.

The protocol's underlying mechanism dynamically adjusts $2OMB's supply, pushing its price up or down relative to the price of $FTM.
Inspired by the original idea behind Basis as well as its predecessors (bDollar and soup), 2omb.finance is a multi-token protocol that consists of the following three tokens:
-2omb ($2OMB).
-2omb Shares ($2SHARE)
-2omb Bonds ($2BOND).
